title: News: Stream Fucked Up's ‘David Comes to Life'
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/THE-COVERfucked.jpg "THE COVERfucked")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/8278-news-stream-fucked-ups-david-comes-to-life/attachment/the-coverfucked/)

New releases from the new Fucked Up LP have been dripping from the band for the last few months, at last the whole album is streaming over on [**NPR**](http://www.npr.org/2011/05/30/136620001/first-listen-f-up-david-comes-to-life). It’s a sprawling, tangled odyssey that clocks in at over an hour in length. That’s a lot of Fucked Up for your buck. Give it a listen [here.](http://www.npr.org/2011/05/30/136620001/first-listen-f-up-david-comes-to-life)
